text: Mohammed Siraj (; born 13 March 1994) is an international cricketer from India who plays for the Indian national cricket team. Mohammed was born on March 13, 1994.Mohammed Siraj He plays for Royal Challengers Bangalore in the Indian Premier League and for Hyderabad in domestic cricket. As of September 2023, Siraj is currently ranked World No. 1 in the ICC men's ODI bowlers rankings. == References == == Other websites == * Mohammad Siraj from ESPNcricinfo Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Indian cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Hyderabad, India Category:Indian Muslims
title: Mohammed Siraj
